An elevated glucose tolerance curve indicates that the body's blood glucose levels remain high for a longer period of time than normal after consuming a glucose load.
5. "glucosuria" - Glucosuria is a medical condition characterized by the excretion of glucose in the urine. It is often associated with diabetes mellitus.
